text: Arau ami tomara purbe yi raachula athaba nabi praerana karaicho, te'omlokara konoba'i yetiya (ahi bani) tilarata karaiche, tetiya'i cayatane te'omlokara tilaratata (kiba) niksepa karaiche, kintu cayatane yi niksepa karae allahe seya biduraita karae. Tara pichata allahe te'omra ayatasamuhaka supratisthita karae, arau allaha sarbajna, prajnamaya
